trans-unit.target: comparte archivos rápidamente con todo el mundo.
trans-unit.note: Label 'quickly share files with everyone.' for the second part of the sentence 'transfers are fast. quickly share files with everyone.', to build this sentence in two colors into the init tour page. Don't forget to place '.' at the end of the string. Keep all in lowercase.
Label for the title of the init tour page dedicated to the speed. Keep MEGA in uppercase and the rest in lowercase, without any punctuation marks. - (String as short as possible).

Label 'transfers are fast.' for the first part of the sentence 'transfers are fast. quickly share files with everyone.', to build this sentence in two colors into the init tour page. Don't forget to place '.' at the end of the string. Keep all in lowercase.

Label '50 GB of free space.' for the second part of the sentence 'register now and get 50 GB of free space.', to build this sentence in two colors into the init tour page. Don't forget to place '.' at the end of the string.
Label for the title of the init tour page dedicated to the space. Keep MEGA in uppercase and the rest in lowercase, without any punctuation marks. - (String as short as possible).

Label 'register now and get' for the first part of the sentence 'register now and get 50 GB of free space.', to build this sentence in two colors into the init tour page. Don't place '.' at the end of the string. Keep all in lowercase.

Label 'end-to-end encryption.' for the second part of the sentence 'keep your files safe with MEGA's end-to-end encryption.', to build this sentence in two colors into the init tour page. Don't forget to place '.' at the end of the string. Keep all in lowercase.
Label for the title of the init tour page dedicated to the privacy. Keep MEGA in uppercase and the rest in lowercase, without any punctuation marks. - (String as short as possible).

trans-unit.source: keep your files safe with MEGA's
trans-unit.target: mantén tus archivos seguros con la MEGA
trans-unit.note: Label 'keep your files safe with MEGA's' for the first part of the sentence 'keep your files safe with MEGA's end-to-end encryption.', to build this sentence in two colors into the init tour page. Don't place '.' at the end of the string. Keep all in lowercase less the word MEGA in uppercase.

Label 'fully encrypted access' for the second part of the sentence 'get fully encrypted access anywhere, anytime.', to build this sentence in three colors into the init tour page. Don't place '.' at the end of the string. Keep all in lowercase.

trans-unit.target: en cualquier lugar, en cualquier momento.
trans-unit.note: Label 'anywhere, anytime.' for the third part of the sentence 'get fully encrypted access anywhere, anytime.', to build this sentence in three colors into the init tour page. Don't forget to place '.' at the end of the string. Keep all in lowercase.
